title: Sixth-Grade High
description: Maxie Granville is horrified when her sixth grade class is moved to the high school building and the older students start calling them "munchkins," but Maxie and her friends come up with a brilliant plan to prove that they can fit in with the other students.Maxie Granville is horrified when her sixth grade class is moved to the high school building and the older students start calling them "munchkins," but Maxie and her friends come up with a brilliant plan to prove that they can fit in with the other students
author: Candice Ransom
